short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract, transform, and copy meta names and properties from websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meta Splicer is a Chrome extension for managing meta attributes on web pages. It displays meta names and their corresponding values in an attribute bar directly on the page. 

You can configure the extension to:

- Assign aliases to attribute names displayed in the attribute bar.

- Trim characters and append strings to the beginning or end of extracted attribute values.

- Set the direction of slashes in strings to be either all forward or all backward.

These transformations are applied as the information is extracted, so itâ€™s ready for you to copy and use wherever you need it.
